text: The East Lancs E Type was a double-decker body of a bus. It had a step entrance. It was built from 1990 to 1996 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders. It was built on Dennis Dominator chassis, Dennis Arrow chassis, Leyland Olympian chassis, Scania N113DRB chassis, Volvo B10M chassis and Volvo Olympian chassis (photo). In 1996, the E Type was replaced by the East Lancs Cityzen and East Lancs Pyoneer. ==References== ==Other websites== * E Type
title: East Lancs E Type
